5D6D2CD2.Line1.F9D80: What!? No! Berolt was one of the few of us who had any fighting spirit left in him! Damn those apostates!

F761A654.Line3.F9D80: He had no apprentice to take up his name or armor, but I will have someone sent to collect his body. I'll do it myself if I have to. May the Light forever bless him.
